question: Which state is to launch a project to develop 800 km roads as Herbal roads?
explanation:
As per the recent announcement of the Deputy Chief Minister of Uttar Pradesh, the state is to develop 800 km roads as Herbal roads in the state.
The Herbal roads will have medicinal trees on both sides, including Peepal, Neem, Sehjan and other important herbal trees. The stateâ€™s Public Works Department will implement the project and rain water recharging system on the roads.
